ComicInfo.Title: The World Beyond!
ComicInfo.Summary: The World Beyond!: Odin tells Thor of the menace of Infinity, which is so immense that Odin himself goes on the mission to halt it, leaving Thor to defend Asgard. Loki, seeing Odinâ€™s departure, gathers an army and attacks Asgard (again!) Having repelled the invaders, Thor has a vision of Odin in peril and prepares to follow his father to The World Beyond.
